title: Dad's spaghetti Bolognese
ingredients: ['500g beef mince', '4 rashers bacon, diced', '1/2 pepper, diced', '4 mushrooms, diced', '1 onion, diced', '1 carrot, grated', '2-3 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '80g tomato puree', 'water', '1 good pinch salt', '1 good pinch pepper', '1 teaspoon sugar', '2-3 tablespoons dried Italian herbs', '1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce', '1 celery stick, whole', '250g spaghetti', 'grated Parmesan cheese to serve']
